pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū anācāraṁ ācaritvā ekamekassa kamme kayiramāne paṭikkosanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena saṅgho sannipatito hoti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.4: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū cīvarakammaṁ karontā ekassa chandaṁ adaṁsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.6: “ayaṁ, āvuso, chabbaggiyo bhikkhu ekako āgato, handassa mayaṁ kammaṁ karomā”ti tassa kammaṁ akāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.7: Atha kho so bhikkhu yena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.13: Sace ca mayaṁ jāneyyāma ‘tuyhaṁ kammaṁ karissatī’ti, na mayaṁ chandaṁ dadeyyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.14: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.15: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū dhammikānaṁ kammānaṁ chandaṁ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṁ āpajjissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.16: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, dhammikānaṁ kammānaṁ chandaṁ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṁ āpajjathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.19: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, dhammikānaṁ kammānaṁ chandaṁ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṁ āpajjissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.21: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.22.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu dhammikānaṁ kammānaṁ chandaṁ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṁ āpajjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.1.6: apalokanakammaṁ ñattikammaṁ ñattidutiyakammaṁ ñatticatutthakammaṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena kataṁ, etaṁ dhammikaṁ nāma kammaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.2.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī chandaṁ datvā khiyyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.2.2: Dhammakamme vematiko chandaṁ datvā khiyyati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.2.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī chandaṁ datvā khiyyati, anāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.3.2: “adhammena vā vaggena vā na kammārahassa vā kammaṁ katan”ti jānanto khiyyati,
